name: ALLRED DVD  "past, present and future"  1
description: the brand new ALLRED DVD Series was just released and started this summer.  you get closer than ever before.. with the intimate and personal footage assembled by John.  he has sit down performances of "without warning, look out, the sound and luna" these brand new videos are shot music video style, but are bare, very indie influenced. so you don't get any other non sense.  just John, the voice and what it was like when the song was first written.  the track listing also includes live footage from the past and present.  two hours worth, all with a functional menu allowing you to navigate to what you want.. including a few covers performed by Allred live.  and last but not least, a personal interview!

name: ALLRED DVD  "past, present and future"  2
description: the brand new ALLRED DVD Series was just released and started this summer.  you get closer than ever before.. with the intimate and personal footage assembled by John.  he has sit down performances of "on a sunday afternoon, stay, this time, one day" these brand new videos are shot music video style, but are bare, very indie influenced. so you don't get any other non sense.  just John, the voice and what it was like when the song was first written.  the track listing also includes live footage from the past and present.  two hours worth, all with a functional menu allowing you to navigate to what you want.. including a few covers performed by Allred live.  and last but not least, two personal interviews!

name: iPod Music Video (Keep Driving)
description: get the music video shot this year for "keep driving" on your ipod.  it's converted over into a quality video formated for iTunes!  you can buy the "keep driving" music video, receive your e mail with the personal link.. and that easy, just click and download!  you get the ipod format video on your computer and ready to drop into iTunes so you can up date your ipod and travel with the "keep driving" music video everywhere.   the video was shot with a very indie-film feel and has a simple underground feel idea to it.
